tmpl:
{{#if ${bannerLists}}}
{{#each ${bannerLists}}}
{{#eq type 1}}
{{#eq @index 0}} {{{nLazyImage imgUrl title 'false'}}} {{^}} {{{nLazyImage imgUrl title 'true'}}} {{/eq}}
{{/eq}} {{#eq type 2}}
{{{nLazyImage video.coverImgUrl title 'false'}}}
{{{lazyVideo video.url ../${settings}.videoMouted false}}}
{{/eq}}
{{#if ${settings}.showText}}
{{#if summary}}

{{summary}}

{{/if}} {{#if title}}

{{title}}

{{/if}} MORE +
{{/if}}
{{/each}}
{{#if ${settings}.pagination}}
{{/if}}
{{#if ${settings}.navigation}}
{{/if}}
scroll down
{{^}} {{{nNoDataPrompt ${i18n.noData}}}} {{/if}}

bannerLists.title: 春季，是四季中的第一个季节，指立春至立夏期间
bannerLists.summary: Spring is the first season of the four seasons, referring to the period from Lichun to Lixia
